title: Power cut schedule from June 06 - 12 announced
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has approved the Ceylon Electricity Board’s request for power interruptions from the 06th to 12th of June, the chairman of electricity sector regulator Janaka Ratnayake says.
• From June 06 to June 08 – Two hours and 15 minutes between 10.45 a.m. and 10.15 p.m.
• From June 09 to June 10 – Two hours and 15 minutes between 10.45 a.m. and 10.15 p.m
• From June 11 to June 12 – One hour between 6.30 p.m. and 10.00 p.m.
Demand Managmet Schedule-06th to 11th June 2022 by Ada Derana on Scribd
